response:
I don't have direct information about specific wellness programs offered by the company. However, I can tell you that the company takes health and wellbeing seriously. Misuse of drugs is strictly prohibited and employees are expected to arrive at work fit to carry out their job without limitations due to drugs. The company also values employee data protection and health records are kept confidential. If you would like more detailed information about wellness programs, I recommend contacting the HR department directly. They will be able to provide you with the most accurate and up-to-date information.

Sources: [1] Home-Working-Agreement.docx, [2] Sickness-And-Absence-Policy.docx, [3] Employee-Data-Protection-Policy-GDPR-Compatible.docx, [4] Drugs-Policy.docx, [5] Sickness-And-Absence-Policy.docx
